channel.title: Posts on Brainfreeze
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Brainfreeze

item.title: Learning Multiple New Technologies at the Same Time
item.description: Intro Learning multiple new technologies may prove to be a challenge. Recently for a new project that I have been assigned to I was in a situation where I had to learn multiple new “tricks” so in timely manner.

item.title: Time to Choose the New Project Tech Stack
item.description: Intro At a team lead it is my responsibility (coordinated with the company's wide technical experience and architects) to choose the new project tech stack. I am the kind of a person that would go with the screaming edge tech just for the rush of experience something new and making my everyday developer life more interesting. However from practical point of view, as the project(integration with a major odds supplier) that we are about to create is somewhat crucial for the business I do not have that liberty and I have to stick with a modern, but proven technologies.
